definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Industrial Index of Karst Accumulat ion Bauxite Orebody at Pingguo;
sentences.chinese: 岩溶堆积型铝土矿是国内新类型的铝土矿床。

sentences.english: Industrial Index of Karst Accumulat ion Bauxite Orebody at Pingguo;
sentences.chinese: 岩溶堆积型铝土矿是国内新类型的铝土矿床。

sentences.english: Once the bauxite is gone, they fear, the streams will run dry.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心一旦铝土不在了，溪流将会干涸。

sentences.english: The troughed ore washer is a key equipment used for desliming the bauxite ore.
sentences.chinese: 槽式洗矿机是铝土矿脱泥的关键设备。

sentences.english: The authors suggest that the main material source of bauxite is originated from its underlying Ordovician limestone.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为孝义铝土矿物质来源主要是下伏奥陶系灰岩。
铝是从铝土岩提炼出来的。

sentences.english: All of the bauxites are formed by weathering without any exception.
sentences.chinese: 铝土矿全部是风化作用形成的，无一例外。

sentences.english: Vietnam has an estimated eight billion tons of high-quality bauxite, the third-largest reserves in the world.
sentences.chinese: 越南估计拥有80亿吨高品质铝土，储量世界第三。

sentences.english: This photo shows a plume of foam in bauxite waste.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片中羽毛状的泡沫是在铝土废料中形成的。

sentences.english: Debao bauxite deposit in Guangxi province is a karst accumulation type deposit.
sentences.chinese: 广西德保铝土矿属于岩溶堆积型矿床。

sentences.english: Becouse of the above advantages the scales of alumina refineries in Australia are large.
sentences.chinese: 同时，澳大利亚的铝土矿还具有开采容易的特点。

sentences.english: The dissolving behavior of iron in bauxite tails in vitriol solution was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了复杂铝土矿浮选尾矿在酸介质中铁的溶解行为。

sentences.english: The bauxite belongs to the genesis of continental mineralization and is batanogeochemical weathering eluvial ore deposits.
sentences.chinese: 铝土矿是陆上成矿，是植物化学风化残积矿床。

sentences.english: Our country is abundant in bauxite which has the property of high-alumina content and high-silica content.
sentences.chinese: 我国铝土矿资源丰富且具有高铝高硅的特性。

sentences.english: Some samples of bauxites and wall-rocks are collected and measured for REE.
sentences.chinese: 对铝土矿及其围岩系统取样，进行稀土元素分析。

sentences.english: Bauxite is the main material in refining aluminum and refractories industries.
sentences.chinese: 铝土矿是炼铝工业及耐火材料工业的主要原料。

definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
